name: Flick (TreeHacks)
description:
Flick is a pinball-like arcade game where you must use your flippers to transform and collect bouncy balls and get the highest score possible.

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrows - Move
  • Z - Left Flipper
  • X - Right Flipper

Credits:

Made by TreeHacks for the One Minute Jam.

"Simple Button Set 02" by "That Witch Design" from the Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/simple-button-set-02-184903

Action Rock by MaxKoMusic | https://maxkomusic.com/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
